context_of_use: The urban mobility planner produces reports on the pollution, fairness, cost, and congestion effects of a mobility measure to support proposal validation.
stakeholders_and_interests: urban mobility planner: to validate urban mobility proposals
description: Produce reports on the pollution, fairness, cost, and congestion effects of a mobility measure to support proposal validation.
triggering_event: The urban mobility planner initiates the reporting process.
preconditions: The urban mobility planner has access to relevant data on the mobility measure.
The mobility measure has been defined.
postconditions: Reports on pollution effects, fairness, cost, and congestion effects are generated and available for review.
The urban mobility planner has validated the impacts of the mobility measure.
assumptions: The system has the capability to estimate measure impacts as part of the reporting process.
requirements_met: The system shall allow the urban mobility planner to report on the pollution effects of a measure.
The system shall allow the urban mobility planner to report on the fairness of a measure.
The system shall allow the urban mobility planner to report on the cost of a measure.
The system shall allow the urban mobility planner to report on the congestion effects of a measure.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the data sources for pollution, fairness, cost, and congestion effects.
main_flow: 1. urban mobility planner → System retrieves data on the mobility measure.
2. urban mobility planner → System estimates measure impacts.
3. urban mobility planner → System generates report on pollution effects.
4. urban mobility planner → System generates report on fairness effects.
5. urban mobility planner → System generates report on cost effects.
6. urban mobility planner → System generates report on congestion effects.
7. urban mobility planner → System presents the reports for review.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 2): If the system cannot estimate measure impacts, then the urban mobility planner is notified of the failure and can choose to re-enter data or cancel the process.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the system fails to retrieve data on the mobility measure, then the urban mobility planner is notified of the error and the process is halted.
